overview: John Scanlon joined Intersections in November 2006 and recently was named Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer after having served as Executive Vice President, Strategic Growth and Chief Operating Officer for Intersectionsâ€™ Business Services division. Prior to Intersections, Mr. Scanlon served as President and Chief Operating Officer for National Auto Inspection, LLC, a venture capital-backed start up company. From 2000 to 2006, Mr. Scanlon held a number of senior executive positions at Capital One Financial Corporation. During his career, Mr. Scanlon has also held key management positions at Columbia Energy Group, A.T. Kearney and J.P. Morgan & Co. Mr. Scanlon holds a B.S. in Business Administration from Georgetown University, and a Masters of Management from the J.L. Kellogg Graduate School of Management at Northwestern University. He also serves on the Board of Directors for Junior Achievement of the National Capital Area.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
